# 人工智能红利的渗透与爆发

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/rengongzhineng-hongli-de-shentou-yu-baofa
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/rengongzhineng-hongli-de-shentou-yu-baofa
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install rengongzhineng-hongli-de-shentou-yu-baofa
rengongzhineng-hongli-de-shentou-yu-baofa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g rengongzhineng-hongli-de-shentou-yu-baofa
rengongzhineng-hongli-de-shentou-yu-baofa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
